summary: Website project: publish a birthday-style site that reliably shows images and plays background music from the start.
architectural_notes: Static assets (images/audio) must be present in the production build (e.g., under public/assets or an equivalent bundled path).
Background audio should be initialized on page load and not rendered as a separate UI section.
known_issues: Production site currently does not display images and does not play the song due to missing/incorrect asset paths or missing files.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Anime-inspired watercolor birthday landscape illustration with warm pastel tones and soft film-grain texture (fallback-anime-watercolor.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Update the preloaded gallery photo path list to match the exact filenames of the uploaded images (including the “-1” suffixes) so the site references the correct static assets.
Remove the dedicated on-page Audio Section UI and replace it with background music that starts from the beginning and plays continuously in the background.
Add a robust fallback so the Photos section always shows at least one valid image even if preloaded photos fail to load (use a locally bundled fallback image).
Render any newly generated image assets as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (do not serve them through the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Ensure at least one valid image is included and displays without errors (use a Ghibli-style image or a real photo as fallback).
Play the song automatically from the beginning as background music (no dedicated song section).
Fix missing/static asset setup so images and audio files are correctly packaged and load in production without errors.
Add the 6 user-uploaded WhatsApp JPEG images as static frontend assets and ensure they load in production without 404s.
Bundle the friendship song audio file as a static frontend asset at the exact path used by the app and ensure the deployed production site can fetch it without errors.

projectName: Fix missing photo/audio assets and enable autoplay background music
